Thanks for Blogspot, I joined Blogspot community in the begin of the year 2014. Blogspot helped me so much when I was a student.

Now I had been working about 13 years (From 2009). Let Blogspot plentiful as thank its. So I decide sharing my little knowledge for help another students and developers.

If you got technical issue, you can visit my technical blog, maybe my blog can help you solved it. There is my blog address: https://learn-tech-tips.blogspot.com.

I would like to share many knowledge about Application, Web, Game, Programming languages: how to easy learn programming as PHP (CAKEPHP, LARAVEL), ... C#, C++, Web(HTML, CSS, javascript). Office (Excel, Photoshop) and another useful things :)

---------------------------------------------------

Thanks and Best Regards!

  • Zidane (any feedback or comment you can contact with me on this email: huuvi168@gmail.com)

Learn Tech Tips - BlogSpot

---------------------------------------------------

I'm developer, I like code, I like to learn new technology and want to be friend with people for learn each other

  • My background is a full stack developer: I have experience for game development around 4+ year and web development around 8+ years. (from 2009)
  • - Experienced in integrated with Paypal, Payme, AsiaPay, HANG SENG NTT Payment gateway (use CryptoJS.enc.Base64.stringify / base64_encode; CryptoJS.enc.Hex.stringify / bin2hex; CryptoJS.HmacSHA256 / hash_hmac, ...)
  • Experience in Aliyun Cloud Service (https://www.alibabacloud.com/): ECS, RDS (postgresQL)
  • Server: setup VPS (Virtual Private Server): use Nginx for config balancing (Ip_hash, least_conn), IIS, Apache
  • Database: work well on Mysql, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, TypeORM,
  • Backend: good at with PHP (WordPress, Laravel, and use it well is CAKEPHP 2.0+ / 4.2.5) , NodeJS (NestJS)
  • .NET C# (2.0; 3.0; 4.5), WPF Window form. ASP.NET MVC 5, API, Webservice, JSON, C++ 11, lua script 4.0 5.0.
  • Frontend: work with HTML, CSS3, Javascript, JQuery, JS Framework, Android
  • Technology used: Restful API, WebService, Process, Window Form, Window Message, Registry, File (INI, JSON, text, XML...), Emulator, Network, Client/Server, Multi-thread, I/O Read Write File, Synchronous & Asynchronous, Inject DLL, Hook, Window Message, File, MFC, Firebase Push Notification, JWT authentication, ...
